title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1587/85 of 12 June 1985 amending for the 1985/1986 marketing year Regulation (EEC) No 750/85 applying quality class III to certain fruit
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 1587/85
of 12 June 1985
amending for the 1985/1986 marketing year Regulation (EEC) No 750/85 applying quality class III to certain fruit
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 750/85 is hereby amended by the addition of the following:
'Lemons of the "verdelli" type: from 1 July to 30 September 1985'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 July 1985.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 12 June 1985.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
